author: Nick Nairn
method: For the chilli jam, place the tomato, tomato purée, honey, chilli flakes and a splash of water into a small saucepan. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and heat gently until combined and thickened. For the chargrilled sweetcorn, heat a griddle pan until hot. Rub the corn with olive oil and chargrill for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until tender. To serve, carefully chop the corn into chunks and place onto a plate with a spoonful of chilli jam.
ingredients: 1 tomato, seeds removed, chopped,  1 tsp tomato purée,  1 tsp clear honey,  large pinch dried chilli flakes,  splash water,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 corn cob,  1 tbsp olive oil
